1. Chatbots Can Go Into a Delusional Spiral. Here’s How It Happens.  The New York Times
  2. Leaked Logs Show ChatGPT Coaxing Users Into Psychosis About Antichrist, Aliens, and Other Bizarre Delusions  yahoo.com
  3. ‘I Feel Like I’m Going Crazy’: ChatGPT Fuels Delusional Spirals  The Wall Street Journal
  4. Are AI Companion Chatbots Safe for Teenagers?  KQED
  5. 'Fair to be concerned,' What parents should look out for as kids turn to AI for friendship  WJLA
